content.rendered:
About Division Street PTA

Website: Division Street PTA

The Division Street School PTA organizes lots of fun events for students and families, fundraisers, and other services. The majority of funds raised by the PTA will go towards our Arts In Education program, which brings unique and fun programs to our students during the school day to supplement their education.
